flavor_text_entries.black:
The two minigears that mesh together
are predetermined. Each will rebound
from other minigears without meshing.
flavor_text_entries.white:
Interlocking two bodies and
spinning around generates
the energy they need to live.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Two bodies comprise a fixed pair.
They spin around each other
to generate energy.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Two bodies comprise a fixed pair.
They spin around each other
to generate energy.
flavor_text_entries.x:
Interlocking two bodies and spinning around
generates the energy they need to live.
flavor_text_entries.y:
The two minigears that mesh together are
predetermined. Each will rebound from other
minigears without meshing.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Interlocking two bodies and spinning around
generates the energy they need to live.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
The two minigears that mesh together are
predetermined. Each will rebound from other

flavor_text_entries.sword:
The two minigears that compose this Pokémon
are closer than twins. They mesh well only with
each other.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
It’s suspected that Klink were the inspiration
behind ancient people’s invention of the
first gears.
